30 //
31 // C++ Mathematical Special Functions
32 //
33 
34 #ifndef _GLIBCXX_BITS_SF_BERNOULLI_TCC
35 #define _GLIBCXX_BITS_SF_BERNOULLI_TCC 1
36 
37 #pragma GCC system_header
38 
39 
40 namespace std _GLIBCXX_VISIBILITY(default)
41 {
42 _GLIBCXX_BEGIN_NAMESPACE_VERSION
43 
44 // Implementation-space details.
45 namespace __detail
46 {
47  /**
48  * @brief This returns Bernoulli numbers from a table or by summation
49  * for larger values.
50  * @f[
51  * B_{2n} = (-1)^{n+1} 2\frac{(2n)!}{(2\pi)^{2n}} \zeta(2n)
52  * @f]
53  *
54  * Note that
55  * @f[
56  * \zeta(2n) - 1 = (-1)^{n+1} \frac{(2\pi)^{2n}}{(2n)!} B_{2n} - 2
57  * @f]
58  * are small and rapidly decreasing finctions of n.
59  *
60  * @param __n the order n of the Bernoulli number.
61  * @return The Bernoulli number of order n.
62  */
63  template<typename _Tp>
64  _GLIBCXX14_CONSTEXPR _Tp
65  __bernoulli_series(unsigned int __n)
66  {
67  constexpr unsigned long _S_num_bern_tab = 12;
68  constexpr _Tp
69  _S_bernoulli_2n[_S_num_bern_tab]
70  {
71  _Tp{1ULL},
72  _Tp{1ULL} / _Tp{6ULL},
73  -_Tp{1ULL} / _Tp{30ULL},
74  _Tp{1ULL} / _Tp{42ULL},
75  -_Tp{1ULL} / _Tp{30ULL},
76  _Tp{5ULL} / _Tp{66ULL},
77  -_Tp{691ULL} / _Tp{2730ULL},
78  _Tp{7ULL} / _Tp{6ULL},
79  -_Tp{3617ULL} / _Tp{510ULL},
80  _Tp{43867ULL} / _Tp{798ULL},
81  -_Tp{174611ULL} / _Tp{330ULL},
82  _Tp{854513ULL} / _Tp{138ULL}
83  };
84 
85  if (__n == 0)
86  return _Tp{1};
87  else if (__n == 1)
88  return -_Tp{1} / _Tp{2};
89  // Take care of the rest of the odd ones.
90  else if (__n % 2 == 1)
91  return _Tp{0};
92  // Take care of some small evens that are painful for the series.
93  else if (__n / 2 < _S_num_bern_tab)
94  return _S_bernoulli_2n[__n / 2];
95  else
96  {
97  constexpr auto _S_eps = __gnu_cxx::__epsilon<>(_Tp{});
98  constexpr auto _S_2pi = __gnu_cxx::__const_2_pi(_Tp{});
99  auto __fact = _Tp{1};
100  if ((__n / 2) % 2 == 0)
101  __fact *= -_Tp{1};
102  for (unsigned int __k = 1; __k <= __n; ++__k)
103  __fact *= __k / _S_2pi;
104  __fact *= _Tp{2};
105 
106  // Riemann zeta function minus-1 for even integer argument.
107  auto __sum = _Tp{0};
108  for (unsigned int __i = 2; __i < 1000; ++__i)
109  {
110  auto __term = std::pow(_Tp(__i), -_Tp(__n));
111  __sum += __term;
112  if (__term < __gnu_cxx::__epsilon<_Tp>() * __sum)
113  break;
114  }
115 
116  return __fact + __fact * __sum;
117  }
118  }
119 
120  /**
121  * @brief This returns Bernoulli number @f$ B_n @f$.
122  *
123  * @param __n the order n of the Bernoulli number.
124  * @return The Bernoulli number of order n.
125  */
126  template<typename _Tp>
127  _GLIBCXX14_CONSTEXPR _Tp
128  __bernoulli(unsigned int __n)
129  { return __bernoulli_series<_Tp>(__n); }
130 
131  /**
132  * @brief This returns Bernoulli number @f$ B_2n @f$ at even integer
133  * arguments @f$ 2n @f$.
134  *
135  * @param __n the half-order n of the Bernoulli number.
136  * @return The Bernoulli number of order 2n.
137  */
138  template<typename _Tp>
139  _GLIBCXX14_CONSTEXPR _Tp
140  __bernoulli_2n(unsigned int __n)
141  { return __bernoulli_series<_Tp>(2 * __n); }
142 
143  /**
144  * Return the Bernoulli polynomial @f$ B_n(x) @f$ of order n at argument x.
145  *
146  * The values at 0 and 1 are equal to the corresponding Bernoulli number:
147  * @f[
148  * B_n(0) = B_n(1) = B_n
149  * @f]
150  *
151  * The derivative is proportional to the previous polynomial:
152  * @f[
153  * B_n'(x) = n * B_{n-1}(x)
154  * @f]
155  *
156  * The series expansion is:
157  * @f[
158  * B_n(x) = \sum_{k=0}^{n} B_k binom{n}{k} x^{n-k}
159  * @f]
160  *
161  * A useful argument promotion is:
162  * @f[
163  * B_n(x+1) - B_n(x) = n * x^{n-1}
164  * @f]
165  */
166  template<typename _Tp>
167  _Tp
168  __bernoulli(unsigned int __n, _Tp __x)
169  {
170  if (std::isnan(__x))
171  return std::numeric_limits<_Tp>::quiet_NaN();
172  else
173  {
174  auto _B_n = __bernoulli<_Tp>(0);
175  auto __binomial = _Tp{1};
176  for (auto __k = 1u; __k <= __n; ++__k)
177  {
178  __binomial *= _Tp(__n + 1 - __k) / _Tp(__k);
179  _B_n = __x * _B_n + __binomial
180  * __bernoulli<_Tp>(__k);
181  }
182  return _B_n;
183  }
184  }
185 } // namespace __detail
186 
187 _GLIBCXX_END_NAMESPACE_VERSION
188 } // namespace std
189 
190 #endif // _GLIBCXX_BITS_SF_BERNOULLI_TCC
